data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Csorba, Gábor, Görföl, Tamás, Wiantoro, Sigit, Kingston, Tigga, Bates, Paul J. J., Huang, Joe Chun-Chia (2015): Thumb-pads up—a new species of thick-thumbed bat from Sumatra (Chiroptera: Vespertilionidae: Glischropus). Zootaxa 3980 (2): 267-278, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3980.2.7
